This does work verey well.  There is a basic mistake that folk are making:-
When you use the KeyGen to generate the serial number for install "Keep the KeyGen OPEN"!! and on the desktop.  It will require the serial number it generates to be visible when you enter the Request Code.
  If both are visble then it will generate the correct validation number.  If you close the KeyGen then only the Request Code will be visible and an incorrect code will be generated.
  Please give credit to the people that upload files and dont assume the software doesnt work.  In most cases the correct procedure just isnt being followed.
  Having said that it *would* help if the folk uploading the files would attach a "readme for idiots" document with them.  Dont assume everyone is experienced - we all had to learn ...
  Great upload - Cheers Bungee :)

"It will require the serial number it generates to be visible when you enter the Request Code."

But where do I get the Request Code? Where is it? And where do I put the Activation Code when I have it? Last time I tried, you could only activate the program via phone/Internet etc.

Oh, right. You were suppose to pick the "by telephone" option during the activation procedure. I don't understand at all why nobody above (or the uploader, preferably) could have _cleared this out_ for us. You have to be very little service-minded not to :)

Anyways. If anyone else don't know how to activate the program, here's what to do:

1. After entering the serial number, keep the keygen open. The serial number must still be there when you go for the activation code.
2. When you're done installing the program, make sure you're not connected to the Internet, and then open Illustrator. You will now have to activate the program, and since you're not connected to the Internet (!) you can choose to do so via the phone.
3. A new page will load with information that is supposed to help you during the phone call. On this page you should be able to find the request code that will get you the activation code. Use it in the keygen.
4. Put the activation code you got from the keygen back in Illustrator and - hurray - your program is activated... :)
